Source code for itv_asset_tree.core.interfaces

# src/itv_asset_tree/core/interfaces.py

from abc import ABC, abstractmethod

# ðŸ”¹ Interface for inserting items into the tree


[docs]
class ITreeInsert(ABC):
    """
    Interface for inserting items into an asset tree.
    
    This interface defines the required method for inserting an item under a specified parent path.
    """


[docs]
    @abstractmethod
    def insert_item(self, parent_path: str, item_definition: dict):
        """
        Inserts an item into the tree under the specified parent path.

        Args:
            parent_path (str): The path of the parent node where the item should be inserted.
            item_definition (dict): A dictionary defining the item's attributes.
        """
        pass





# ðŸ”¹ Interface for moving items in the tree


[docs]
class ITreeMove(ABC):
    """
    Interface for moving items within an asset tree.
    
    This interface enforces the implementation of item movement between tree locations.
    """


[docs]
    @abstractmethod
    def move_item(self, source: str, destination: str):
        """
        Moves an item from the source path to the destination path.

        Args:
            source (str): The current location of the item in the tree.
            destination (str): The new location where the item should be moved.
        """
        pass





# ðŸ”¹ Interface for removing items from the tree


[docs]
class ITreeRemove(ABC):
    """
    Interface for removing items from an asset tree.
    
    This interface enforces the implementation of item deletion within a tree structure.
    """


[docs]
    @abstractmethod
    def remove_item(self, item_path: str):
        """
        Removes an item from the tree at the specified path.

        Args:
            item_path (str): The path of the item to be removed.
        """
        pass
